title: Roborock S7 MaxV launches with new AI obstacle avoidance, Siri Shortcuts support, more [$90 off deal]
content:
With almost a decade of experience leading the robot vacuum industry under its belt, Roborock is out with its most impressive model yet. The comes with super-strong 5100pa suction power, an all-new obstacle avoidance system, sonic mopping to handle the toughest grime, Siri Shortcuts support, and much more. Check out all the details below including a launch promotion for $90 off the S7 MaxV robot vacuum and mop.

description: The Roborock S7 MaxV is here. The new flagship robot vacuum and mop offers all-new AI obstacle avoidance, super-strong suction, and more.
